name: YetAnotherPlatformer
description:
YetAnotherPlatformer is a short free narrative-adventure based game developed as part of a group assignment for DT508 Game Design. This is a group assignment as part of a college course (DT508), some bugs should be expected .

You, the adventurer must find and slay the impostor King while navigating  fair-puzzles and finding hidden treasures within the Castle.
